page.title: 17Sarn Youth Club
page.content: I go to the{youth club}and it is very good for all ages.Round about thirty children go and they think it is very good.I enjoy them every time it comes. It is always the fourth{Thursday}at the end of the month,half past six to 8 o'clock is the time that it starts and finishes.We take{games}and play with them for about an hour.Then the older ones go out and play games like football and cricket on the field, while the younger ones stay in and have a{story}and then draw about it. Different people take us every month. It costs 10p to get in.The Church Choir also practises their hymns for their Family Service in Church.I have not missed a meeting of the Youth club.
